title: 300+ COVID cases on Sunday (13)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Government Information said 311 new COVID-19 cases were detected in the country on Sunday (13).
The total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in Sri Lanka now stands at 656,041.
The Director-General of Health Services on Sunday (13) confirmed that 7 COVID-19 deaths were reported in the country on Saturday (12).
Cut taxes on fuel, says Gammanpila while asking why SLPP is silent on price hike?
